name: photoconductivity
content:

the property of allowing an electrical current to move through more easily after being hit by light: He had the idea of making a copying machine based on the principle of photoconductivity. We were able to measure the relationship between frequency and photoconductivity in great detail.
More examplesFewer examplesThey discovered the phenomenon of photoconductivity after shining a light onto the surface of a bar of selenium. Photoconductivity is one of the most complex phenomena in physics.Photoconductivity is only observed in non-metallic solids.
